evidence.claim: Arrotek utilizes Amazon Web Services for its cloud infrastructure.
The company is compliant with FHIR standards for healthcare data exchange.
Integration with HL7 and X12 transaction sets is supported which is crucial for health tech solutions.
Arrotek's applications employ Microsoft Azure for scalable service deployment.
They implement real-time data streaming for efficient healthcare data processing.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on X12 and EDI for healthcare integration aligns with API-first data exchange.
